# create_bob { #databpy.create_bob }

```python
create_bob(
    vertices=None,
    edges=None,
    faces=None,
    name='NewObject',
    collection=None,
    uuid=None,
)
```

Create a BlenderObject wrapper around a new Blender mesh object.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name       | Type                                                                           | Description                                                            | Default       |
|------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------|
| vertices   | [ndarray](`ndarray`) or None                                                   | Array of vertex coordinates. Default is None.                          | `None`        |
| edges      | [ndarray](`ndarray`) or None                                                   | Array of edge indices. Default is None.                                | `None`        |
| faces      | [ndarray](`ndarray`) or None                                                   | Array of face indices. Default is None.                                | `None`        |
| name       | [str](`str`)                                                                   | Name of the created object. Default is "NewObject".                    | `'NewObject'` |
| collection | [bpy](`bpy`).[types](`bpy.types`).[Collection](`bpy.types.Collection`) or None | Blender collection to link the object to. Default is None.             | `None`        |
| uuid       | [str](`str`) or None                                                           | Directly set the UUID on the resulting BlenderObject. Default is None. | `None`        |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                                            | Description                    |
|--------|-------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------|
|        | [BlenderObject](`databpy.object.BlenderObject`) | A wrapped Blender mesh object. |
